players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and found her to be mafia. Alice knows I'm detective. I have no reason to suspect Bob."
You: "I was with Bob that night. Bob was with me. I didn't kill Diana. Charlie, you might be lying."
Bob: "I think Alice is mafia, Charlie's investigation confirms. Alice's alibi is weak."
Charlie: "I confirm Alice is mafia, Bob supports, Alice knows I'm detective and lied. Vote Alice."
You: "Bob might have killed Diana. He had no alibi. Charlie's investigation may be wrong."
Bob: " message. So we can say: "
